comments:
It would be beneficial if VE could support editing of inner classes. I develop a
lot of Eclipse RCP code and by adding visual inner classes to my views / editors
I could more easily write code. I know I could create a normal class and that
call it in my views / editors, but this I would prefer to use inner classes.
*** Bug 84684 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=17780)
a simlpe inner classes usage

The example in the attachment shows a simple custom jpanel that draws a red
grid under jfc controls. This is a quite common inner classes usage.
With the attached sample VE thows NPEs and it is not able to show the JFrame
contents.
